site.title: Oxford Academy Robotics
site.description: Oxford Academy Robotics - Excellence in FRC, FTC, and VEX robotics competitions. Join our award-winning STEM education programs.
site.keywords: Oxford Academy Robotics, FRC Team 4079, FTC Teams, VEX Teams, STEM Education, Robotics Competition

aboutBrief.title: About Us
aboutBrief.description: Oxford Academy Robotics is a student-run organization that competes in the FIRST Robotics Competition (FRC), FIRST Tech Challenge (FTC), and VEX Robotics Competition. Our mission is to inspire students to pursue careers in STEM fields by providing them with the opportunity to learn, compete, and thrive in a supportive environment.

goals.title: Our Goals
goals.description: We are Oxford Academy Robotics, a high school robotics team based in Cypress, California. We are dedicated to inspiring students to pursue careers in STEM fields through hands-on experience in robotics.

hero.title: About Oxford Academy Robotics
hero.subtitle: Building the future through innovation and teamwork

sections.title: Our Mission
sections.content: To inspire students to pursue careers in STEM fields by providing hands-on experience in robotics, engineering, and innovation while fostering teamwork, leadership, and problem-solving skills.

sections.title: Our History
sections.content: Founded in 2012, Oxford Academy Robotics has grown from a small group of passionate students to one of California's premier high school robotics programs, competing successfully in FRC, FTC, and VEX competitions.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Ready to join our robotics family?

form.title: Contact Us
form.subtitle: Have questions? Want to join? We'd love to hear from you!

frc.title: FIRST Robotics Competition
frc.subtitle: Team 4079 - The Nuclear Knights
frc.description: Our FRC team competes in the most challenging high school robotics competition, building 120+ pound robots to compete in dynamic games.

ftc.title: FIRST Tech Challenge
ftc.subtitle: Building Innovation Together
ftc.description: Our FTC teams focus on designing, building, and programming robots to compete in alliance-based competitions.

vex.title: VEX Robotics Competition
vex.subtitle: Precision Engineering
vex.description: VEX Robotics allows students to design and build robots using the VEX platform, emphasizing mechanical design and programming skills.
